import React, { useState } from 'react'; import PageHeader from '../../components/PageHeader'; import Textarea from '../../components/Textarea'; import Select from '../../components/Select'; import './styles.css' import Input from '../../components/Input'; import warningIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/warning.svg'; function TeacherForm(){ const [scheduleItems, setScheduleItems] = useState([ {week_day: 0, from: '8:00 AM', to: '4:00 PM'}, {week_day: 2, from: '10:00 AM', to: '6:00 PM'}, ]); function addNewScheduleItem(){ setScheduleItems([ ...scheduleItems, {week_day: 0, from: '', to: ''}, ]); } return(
